resources.string: Sicela uvuselele uhlelo lokusebenza lube lwakamuva
%3$s idinga ukuthi uhlelo lokusebenza %1$s lufakwe kule foni. Okokuqala, xhumanisa u-%2$s kuhlelo lokusebenza %1$s. Khetha le nketho uma ufuna ukusebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza %1$s futhi.

Uhlelo lokusebenza %1$s aludingiwa ukuthi %3$s lusebenza. Ngemva kokuxhumanisa, ungakhipha uhlelo lokusebenza %1$s noma uhlukanise isongo. Ukubuyisela ukubambisana no-%1$s, kuzodingeka uxhumanise kabusha u-%2$s kuhlelo lokusebenza %1$s. Uma usebenzisa umsebenzi wokuhlukanisa, idatha esesongweni izosuswa. Qinisekisa ukuthi isikrini sika-%2$s sivuliwe ngesikhathi sokuxhumanisa.

Ukuze kugwenywe ukulahleka kwedatha nokunemba kwedatha, ukuvumelanisa kukhutshaziwe ngemodi yokubambisana. Ukuvumelanisa kuzokususa idatha yesongo bese kuholela emiphumeleni engalungile kuzo zombili izinhlelo zokusebenza.
Faka noma yiliphi inombolo enamadijithi angu-4
Idivayisi yakho seyixhunyiwe. Uma ungawazi ukhiye, sicela uhlukanise kuqala.

- Hlukanisa isongo kuzilungiselelo ze-Bluetooth zefoni yakho
- Cisha i-Bluetooth bese uyivula futhi
- Vala uhlelo lokusebenza ngokuphoqelela noma uqale kabusha ifoni
- Zama futhi ukuxhumanisa isongo kusukela ekhasini eliyisiqalo

Khetha ukuthi iyiphi idatha okufanele ivumelaniswe ngokuzenzakalelayo ngemuva. Uma ungayidingi, cisha ukuze uthuthukise ukusebenza. Usengavumelanisa ngesandla kusikrini sokuqala noma kumamenyu afanele (hudulela phansi).
Faka le datha ukuthuthukisa ukunemba kwezinyathelo, ibanga namakhalori okubalwa.
Vumela uhlelo lokusebenza luqale kabusha ngokuzenzakalelayo ku-Auto-start manager yefoni
Kudingeka imvume eyengeziwe ukuze kuhlelwe umsebenzi ngesikhathi esithile.
Kudingeka imvume eyengeziwe ukuze kuboniswe izaziso
Sicela uvule i-Bluetooth bese ubeka iwashi eduze nefonini yakho
Uma %1$s ingatholakali, vula imodi yokutholakala noma uyixhume ngezilungiselelo ze-Bluetooth zefoni
Vumela ukufinyelela kwezaziso: Ifoni > Izilungiselelo > Ukufinyelela kwezaziso
Vumela ukufinyelela kwezaziso: Izilungiselelo > Ezokuphepha > Ukufinyelela kwezaziso
Kusetshenziswa kuphela usethaphu olulodwa kuhlelo lwasimahla
Kufika ku-%1$,d usethaphu kungenziwa kuhlelo lwasimahla
Kufika ku-%1$,d amaqembu asetshenziswa kuhlelo lwasimahla
Uhlelo olulodwa kuphela lungakhethwa kuhlelo lwasimahla
Kufika ku-%1$,d izinhlelo zokusebenza zingakhethwa kuhlelo lwasimahla
Umbhalo owodwa kuphela ungarekhodwa kuhlelo lwasimahla
I-alamu eyodwa kuphela ingasetshenziswa kuhlelo lwasimahla
Iphethini enikeziwe ifana nesezinye izici, sicela usebenzise ehlukile
Kufika ku-%1$,d izilawuli zingasetshenziswa kuhlelo lwasimahla
Sebenzisa imisebenzi ye-%1$s yokulawula umculo/nokuthola ifoni
Lesi sici sitholakala kuphela kuhlelo lwePremium
Kutholwe umlayezo omusha. Bheka efonini yakho.

Amadivayisi asesekelwayo:

Ukuze usebenzise i-, kufanele ufake uhlelo olusemthethweni lwe- kule foni efanayo. Qala ngokuxhuma iwashi lakho kuhlelo lwe-, bese usebenzisa lolu hlelo.

Uma usesha i- ungaphumeleli, ungafaka ikheli le-MAC ngesandla ngesikhathi sokusesha.

Izindlela zokuxazulula izinkinga zoxhumo:
- Isikrini sezinhlelo zakamuva: vala i- (hudula phansi ku-preyivyu ye-app bese ukhetha i-\'Lock\' noma okufanayo).
- Ukuthuthukiswa kwebhethri: shintsha i- ukuze ingathuthukiswa.
- Ifoni/izinhlelo zokusebenza: cisha idatha ye-Bluetooth Share nezinye izinhlelo ze-\'Bluetooth\'.
- Ulwazi olwengeziwe: https://dontkillmyapp.com

Lo mkhiqizo nezici zawo azihloselwe ukusetshenziswa kwezokwelapha, futhi awuhloselwe ukubikezela, ukuthola, ukuvimbela, noma ukwelapha izifo. Yonke idatha nezilinganiso zenzelwe ukusetshenziswa komuntu siqu kuphela, futhi akufanele isetshenziswe njengesizathu sokuxilongwa noma ukwelashwa.
Xwayisa kuphela uma isihloko noma okuqukethwe kufana (akubheki amacala ombhalo)
Izimpawu ezingezona izinhlamvu nezinombolo zinemisebenzi ekhethekile. Uma ungazi ukuthi i-Regex isetshenziswa kanjani, ungakukhethi lokhu.
Ungakhohlwa ukuvala izaziso zocingo olungenayo kuhlelo lokusebenza lwe-%1$s
Kufika ku-%1$d oxhumana nabo bangasetshenziswa kumodi yamahhala
Ukuvumelanisa ama-alamu e-%1$s (lokhu kuzokhipha ama-alamu akhona bese kufakwa amasha kuwashi)

Lapho usebenzisa imodi yokubambisana, izilungiselelo zohlelo lokusebenza olusemthethweni nolwe- zingaqeda noma zifihle izilungiselelo zomunye nomunye.

Isenzo sokugcina sizoba esisebenzayo.
Isikhumbuzi esisodwa kuphela siyatholakala kumodi yamahhala
Ukuze kuboniswe isikhumbuzi, kudingeka uxhumano lwe-Bluetooth.
Cisha i-Bluetooth ekuqaleni kwe-DnD, bese uyivula ekupheleni
Uma usebenzisa imodi yokubambisana, kuhlelo lokusebenza lwe-<device_type/> olusemthethweni, imodi ye-DnD kumele ibe phakathi kuka-00:00 no-23:59 futhi isimo sayo kufanele sibe sevaliwe.

Ungabelana ngobuso bewashi owenze lona nabanye. Thumela ubuso bewashi namafayela okubuka kuqala nge-imeyili, bese ufaka imininingwane elandelayo: igama lombhali, igama lobuso bewashi (okungaba semkhawulweni wama-30 abalingiswa), nolimi. Sishicilela kuphela ubuso bewashi obusezingeni eliphezulu.

I-firmware %1$s ayaziwa noma ayisekeli ukulayishwa kobuso bewashi. Sicela uvuselele i-firmware usebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza olusemthethweni. Uma uhlelo olusemthethweni lusekela ukulayisha, sicela usazise ngeMenyu Yokubuyisela Impendulo.
Sebenzisa imodi ezimele, ngoba uma usebenzisa imodi yokubambisana, uhlelo olusemthethweni lungavimba ukulayishwa kobuso bewashi
Awukwazi ukulayisha ubuso bewashi obengeziwe namuhla kumodi yamahhala
Beka isivinini esiphansi uma ukulayishwa kobuso bewashi kuphazamiseka
Usayizi wefayela lobuso bewashi awusebenzi, yehlisa ikhwalithi noma susa izinto ebusweni bewashi
Ibhethri lewashi seliseduze ukuphela, sicela ulishaje
Usayizi wefayela ungancishiswa uma iwashi likuvumela
Amagama ezinsuku, uhlukaniso lwenyanga kanye nophawu lwedesimali
Le washi ayisekeli ukulayishwa kobuso bewashi obenziwe wena
Izici zokulayisha ubuso bewashi obenziwe wena zisathuthukiswa futhi zingase zitholakale esikhathini esizayo, kodwa lokhu akukakaqinisekiswa.
Setha le misebenzi uma usebenzisa imodi ezimele noma uma i-Mi Fit ingayilawuli kahle
Umsindo kuphela uma ingathulisiwe noma ingekho ku-DnD
Qala umculo ngenkinobho yokudlala uma umdlali womculo engaziwa
Faka uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-Tasker kuqala, bese i-Mi Bandage
Inani eliphansi lisho ukuthi izinkinobho kufanele zichofozwe ngokushesha okulandelanayo

Kusebenza kahle kwimodi ezimele. Uma usebenzisa imodi yokubambisana, uhlelo olusemthethweni nalo luzolawula le misebenzi, ngakho ukusebenza kahle akunakuqinisekiswa.

Izilungiselelo ze-Bluetooth zefoni: khubaza idivayisi yokufaka

Ukuthinta okubonawe

ukulawula umculo


thola ifoni yami

Ukuthinta okuningi kungarekhodwa ngomsebenzi ngamunye.
Lolu hlelo lokusebenza luqoqa idatha yendawo ukuze luhlale luvuselela isimo sezulu, noma uhlelo lufakwe noma lungasetshenziswa.
%1$s uzothola imvume yokuqoqa idatha yendawo noma ngabe uhlelo alusebenzi noma alusetshenziswa
Vula Izilungiselelo bese ukhetha inketho ethi ”%1$s” yezimvume zendawo
Isexwayiso > Umsebenzi wesikhumbuzo usebenzisa lesi sikhathi
Guqula izinhlamvu ezinezinhlamvu ezinezimpawu zibe ngaphandle kwezimpawu
Shintsha umhlukanisi womugqa ojwayelekile ngeminye imifanekiso
Ukwenza ngokuzenzakalelayo nge-imeyili, kungenzeka ungatholi impendulo

• ukwesekwa kwezezimali ekuthuthukisweni kohlelo

• akukho zikhangiso

• izilungiselelo zezaziso ezingapheli

• izilungiselelo zokushayela ezingapheli

• ukulayishwa kobuso bewashi nsuku zonke ngaphandle komkhawulo

• inani elingenamkhawulo lama-alamu (kuncike ekuxhasweni iwashi)

• imodi ethi Ungaphazanyiswa engenamkhawulo

• izilungiselelo zokuthinta ezingapheli

• izibuyekezo zesimo sezulu ezivamile, izibuyekezo ezizenzakalelayo zendawo, inketho yokusebenzisa i-AccuWeather

• amashadi anemininingwane yanamuhla

• ukuvuleka kwemikhawulo yonke yezinye izici…

• Ngizame uhlelo lokusebenza futhi ngathola ukuthi lusebenza ngendlela ebengilindele.

• Ngiyakuqonda ukuthi angikwazi ukufuna ukubuyiselwa kwemali noma isinxephezelo ngezinkinga ezibangelwa izinguquko ohlelweni (njengokubuyekezwa kwe-Android), okokusebenza, noma ukungqubuzana nezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza.

• Zonke izinkokhelo zokuthenga ziyi-final futhi azibuyiselwa imali (ngaphandle kokuthi umthetho kaGoogle wokubuyiselwa kwemali ukuvumela).

• Lolu hlelo aluqinisekisiwe nganoma iyiphi indlela, kungaba ngokusobala noma ngokucatshangelwa.

• Ukusetshenziswa kohlelo lokusebenza kwenzeka ngomthwalo wakho siqu. Umthuthukisi akanasibopho noma yimuphi umonakalo oqondile noma ongathí sina, noma ukulahleka kwedatha okubangelwa ukusetshenziswa kwalo.

• Imodi yePremium ixhunywe ku-akhawunti yakho ye-Google futhi iyaqhubeka nokusebenza ngisho nangemva kokuphinda ulande uhlelo.

Ngemva kokuthenga, uhlelo lokusebenza kumele luqalwe kabusha.

• Siqoqa kuphela imininingwane engaziwa.

• Siqoqa izibalo zokusebenzisa ezingeni lesicelo (Google Analytics).

• Siqoqa imininingwane yeziphazamiso, amaphutha, nezinhlekelele ukuze sithuthukise (Firebase Crashlytics).

• Siqoqa imininingwane yokusebenza kohlelo ukuze sithuthukise ukusebenza (Firebase Performance Monitoring).

• I-Google Firebase iqoqa imininingwane ngokungaziwa. Ihlaziya izinto ezithrendayo ngaphandle kokuqonda umuntu ngamunye.
Idatha eqoqwayo ifaka: i-Firebase installation ID, isimo sesicelo, ulwazi lwedivayisi (imodeli, i-CPU, i-RAM ne-hard disk, uhlelo lokusebenza, izilungiselelo zesikrini, izwe, ulimi), amabhulogi wamaphutha, izilinganiso zokusebenza ( isikhathi sokuvula uhlelo, ubude bokuphendula kwezicelo zenethiwekhi, amakheli e-URL, ukusetshenziswa kwe-CPU/RAM, ikheli le-IP elilinganiselwe…)

• Siqoqa indawo yakho kuphela uma uvuma, ukuze sibuyekeze isimo sezulu sedolobha lakho.

• Izizathu zomthetho zokuqoqwa kwedatha yimizamo yethu esemthethweni yokwenza uhlelo lusebenza kangcono, lusebenze kahle futhi luhlale lusebenziseka.

• Abanye abahlinzeki besithathu, njengokuthi AdMob, bangase basebenzise amakhukhi noma izindlela ezifanayo ukuthumela izikhangiso ezenziwe ngokwezifiso. Ungalawula ukwenza ngezifiso izikhangiso kusethaphu ye-akhawunti yakho ye-Google.
• Idatha eqoqiwe igcinwa yi-Google Firebase ngokuvumelana nemigomo yayo futhi kuphela isikhathi esidingekayo ukwenza ukuhlaziywa, ukuhlonza amaphutha, nokuthuthukisa ukusebenza kohlelo.

• Asikhohlwa imininingwane ezokwaziwa ngomuntu siqu. Lokhu kusho ukuthi asiquqi imininingwane efana negama lakho, ikheli, inombolo yocingo, i-imeyili noma i-MAC address.

• Asiquqi imininingwane yomuntu ngesimo sempilo, oxhumana naye, noma okuqukethwe kwezaziso ezinsizeni zakho.
• Asabelani nganoma yimuphi ulwazi nezinye izinkampani noma izinhlangano ngaphandle kwe-Google nabahlinzeki bezikhangiso.
• Si sebenzisa indawo kuphela uma wethula isici sezulu futhi kuphela uma uvume.

• Idatha ye-analytics, yokuhlola amaphutha kanye nokusebenza eqoqwa ngeke ikwazi ukukwenza ungaziwa. Akuyona imininingwane yomuntu siqu ngaphansi kwemithetho efana ne-GDPR, futhi awukwazi ukufuna ukufinyelela, ukulungisa noma ukususa yona.

• Ungayeka ukuqoqwa kwedatha nganoma yisiphi isikhathi ngokususa uhlelo noma ngokulawula izilungiselelo zobumfihlo ku-Google noma kudivayisi yakho.

• Uma unemibuzo nge-data noma amalungelo akho obumfihlo, sicela uxhumane nathi kusizo lwe-app.

Inqubomgomo yobumfihlo ye-Google (kuhlanganisa ne-Google Play Services)

AdMob – Ukusetshenziswa kwedatha

Google Analytics – Ukusetshenziswa kwedatha

Imigomo ye-Firebase Crashlytics

Inqubomgomo yobumfihlo ne-Security yezinhlelo ze-Firebase (kuhlanganisa ne-Performance Monitoring)
Izikhangiso ezingezona ezomuntu siqu, ezingasebenzi kahle kakhulu
